decoworld.model.world.combat.groups

Class AlliedGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.model.world.combat.groups.EntityGroup
      • decoworld.model.world.combat.groups.AlliedGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StatListener, java.lang.Iterable<WorldItem>

    public class AlliedGroup
extends EntityGroup
implements StatListener
    Members of this group can't deal combat damage to each other if they implement HasStats.
